text: phir kya vah achchha hai jisane apane bhavan kee aadhaarashila allaah ke bhay aur usakee khushee par rakhee hai ya vah, jisane apane bhavan kee aadhaarashila kisee khaee ke khokhale kagaar par rakhee, jo girane ko hai. phir vah use lekar jahannam kee aag mein ja gira? allaah to atyaachaaree logon ko seedha maarg nahin dikhaata
